content:
Hello everyone,

Registration for the Student Track at DevDays Amsterdam is now open! Please see https://www.devdays.com/amsterdam/student-track/ for more information. Any questions? Contact me!

Best regards,
Niek van Galen
How do I obtain student ticket for FHIR dev days. Do I need a discount code?
Hi @Hari Kunamneni, please go to https://www.devdays.com/amsterdam/student-track/. You'll find all the details there.

Hello everyone,

On the Student Track page https://www.devdays.com/amsterdam/student-track, I found that the deadline for submitting an open assignment has been removed and some information has also been changed. Could anyone please confirm that? Does this mean we are going to present our assignment on November 21 instead of sending the assignment in October?

Kind regards,

Thanaphop
@Niek van Galen @Rien Wertheim

Hi @Thanaphop Na nakhonphanom

Yes, we decided to skip the online presentations and hackathon in October, and "only" do the student track part on 21st of November in Amsterdam. This means that all students who have applied (or will apply before October 1st) are invited to join us in Amsterdam on November 21st, and the pre-selection is skipped. So that means the online part has been canceled entirely.
